lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator

Class CoinChannelSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsmr.vendingmachine.simulator.CoinChannelSimulator

  • public class CoinChannelSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a simple device (like, say, a tube) that allows coins to move between other devices.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoinChannelSimulator(AbstractCoinAcceptor sink)
      Constructs a new coin channel whose output is connected to the indicated sink.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deliver(Coin coin)
      Moves the indicated coin to the sink.
      AbstractCoinAcceptor getSink()
      Returns the sink to which this channel is connected.
      boolean hasSpace()
      Returns whether the sink has space for at least one more coin.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoinChannelSimulator

        public CoinChannelSimulator(AbstractCoinAcceptor sink)
        Constructs a new coin channel whose output is connected to the indicated sink.

    • Method Detail

      • deliver

        public void deliver(Coin coin)
             throws CapacityExceededException,
                    DisabledException
        Moves the indicated coin to the sink. This method should be called by the source device, and not by an external application.
        Throws:
        CapacityExceededException - if the sink has no space for the coin.
        DisabledException - if the sink is currently disabled.

      • getSink

        public AbstractCoinAcceptor getSink()
        Returns the sink to which this channel is connected.

      • hasSpace

        public boolean hasSpace()
        Returns whether the sink has space for at least one more coin.
